column1: NGR is the pumping station. Altitudes match. 1950s record has NGR of SK325555, which places the gauge on the wrong side of the river, but only 100m difference. 1910s record missing values for 1910 to 1916 taken from British Rainfall reports, no results for 1916 to 1919.
Jan and Jul 1946 have amendments as does the total, no explamation; left in this record
